      AvroGenerator AvroFactory.createGenerator(OutputStream out)
      Since Avro format always uses UTF-8 internally, no encoding need to be passed to this method.

      note: co-variant return type

      Not sure what to do here; will always indent, but uses YAML-specific settings etc.
      AvroGenerator AvroGenerator.useDefaultPrettyPrinter()
      Not sure what to do here; could reset indentation to some value maybe?
